website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks common to loofahs, this pack of eight offers natural materials, reliable exfoliating, and versatile uses.
pros: A generous pack of eight that feature hand straps
Terry cloth backing makes them easy to use
cons: Pads are somewhat thin, and may begin falling apart after several months of use
Texture is a bit rough at first, but softens with use

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like them so far. One side is very soft the other side is great for exfoliating skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tangie101

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for money
customer_reviews.text: The number of pads you get for the price is fantastic. The fibers are strong and give a good scrub to the skin. I had to learn how to build up a good foam to wash with, but once I did it's been great. They hang dry which help minimize discoloration, but it does still occur.
customer_reviews.author: student

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome and I love that I have a package of them for just a little more than I would have paid for one or two at a local store. Aside from that, they are well made and exfoliate well without feeling like I’m scraping my skin off. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great loofah
customer_reviews.text: Use them a lot. Can save you money if you clean them right. First couple of uses feels extremely rough on skin
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for but better. They have a small loop to hang it up from to dry in between showers. Comes with 8 sponges.
customer_reviews.author: klmull85

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described. Holds up really well. Just the right size. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality item
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Super high quality. And the suction cup home they throw in are great. I'm very happy with these. Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, price, and bundle pack!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only kind of "loofah" I'll use! Changed my skin for the better. Finally got my husband to switch to these after getting this bundle! Such a great price for the amount and quality you get. Only tried to use the hook once and it failed. Might have been my fault, not sure. But we have hooks on our shower caddy so it didnt matter to us anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Maharg

customer_reviews.title: Coarse & firm at first-which I love since I'm obviously buying it to exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Coarse & firm at first-which I love since I'm obviously buying it to exfoliate. Does soften up over time, but by the time I feel like its no longer scrubbing well enough, its time to replace it anyways. Love that I don't have to go hunting these down at my local Walmart, and can just buy in bulk on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Last much longer than the ones I had been buying at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Marny

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully this is sanitary but I use one for about ...
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this is sanitary but I use one for about a week or 2 and they seem to stay clean, and for their price that's not so bad
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I was not confident going into this purchase, but I'm happily surprised. The product is exactly as described, and the loofah is tough, but not too tough, and softens a bit over time. I got the pack to replace them every 1.5 months, and it's been going great. I docked 1 star because 1 out of the 3 I've used so far has a jagged piece sticking out of the back where your hand goes. It's not the end of the world, it's just a plastic piece and it barely bothers me, but I can't consciously rate this 5 stars with it.
customer_reviews.author: Finn Krann

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Understand a loofah material is quite abrasive, not for delicate skin like that of the face. If you let it soak it will become softer, and gets softer with use.
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Sponge pads work well as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I get really dry patches of skin during the winter time. These exfoliating sponge pads do a great job taking off all the dead skin. Just make sure first that they are very wet and have plenty of soap on them. I also highly recommend that you rinse them very well after each use and hang them on the hook to dry well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product and I used it right away. I love how easy it is to use, and the power of the suction works perfect. It comes with attachments that you can use to get those tight places, and a brush to get those really dirty spots in your car. The cord is also quite long, so whatever size vehicle you have you will have enough cord length to handle it. The compartment to empty the dirt is easy to remove and dump. I clean my car weekly, so I might have a following up review in a month or two to let you know how it handles.
customer_reviews.author: Kenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sponge. Not to rough. Soft enough for face. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Works great however
customer_reviews.text: Works great but after about a week or two it starts to stink rotten on the sides cuz the water doesn’t dry by the next day. So you have to replace them about every two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Great sponge pads!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sponge pads for your skin.Feel so natural and not too abrasive.Strap on back works great for scrubbing!
customer_reviews.author: Krose

customer_reviews.title: A little bit stiff
customer_reviews.text: I find them a bit too stiff and not as comfortable to use as a regular plastic loofah from the drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty pleased with this product, but the suction cup does NOT work under any circumstances. Unfortunate. However, would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Nd

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not my favorite texture
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would have a little more texture, and be a little more scrubby. I’m not sure if natural loofah’s are normally this soft, but I’m not a huge fan of the texture. But I can’t hit it for that, that’s my own preference. However, the size is a little weird. Too big to be just for your face, but not quite the right size or shape to comfortably be used for body in my opinion. The elastic on the back stretches way out if you put your hand in it, and slips right off. So you have to hold it very awkwardly so that it doesn’t go flying.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: short changed
customer_reviews.text: I received this order the bag was torn from the bottom only received 4 of the 8 and no suction cups that is one reason I ordered this. This is the 3rd order in last two weeks that has been messed up through amazon or the product manufacturer . disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use them every day
customer_reviews.text: I use these to scrub my bald head and they work great to exfoliate without pain or damage. Seems to be just the right amount of "grit" to do the job without scraping the skin. If you rinse them and let them air out well (on the included suction cups or in a wire rack), you can easily get two weeks or more of daily use with no breakdown or odor.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: The perfect loofah
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for years for a soft, pliable loofah, like the ones I used to grow myself. The trick is to harvest them when they are young, or they get very stiff and hard to use. Seems everyone wants that kind, but not me. This little loofah mitten is the perfect solution to my years-long journey. Soft, yet able to make you feel soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Majesta

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the quality of this product, They are hard and lumpy, even when soaked in hot water. I asked for a refund, which Amazon responded to immediately.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent with quality
customer_reviews.text: It's not consistent. Several loofahs are super flimsy and they never dry out. Only a couple of loofahs are sturdy and are good quality. For the price, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight

customer_reviews.title: My biggest issue is out of the package the seem great, but once i added soap to them and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok pads to wash yourself with. My biggest issue is out of the package the seem great, but once i added soap to them and started to wash, they became matted down, and didnt feel like it was scrubbing my sking at all. So for that i give the 3 stars. They are great as travel loofahs, but not what i was looking for as something i use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, got no suction hanging hooks.
customer_reviews.text: I got no suction hanging hooks, but the product itself is great. For whoever thinks it's too rough or is upset that it changes it's shape probably never tried a loofah before. I find that after I tried 3 different loofah products, this is the most comfortable one - and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Diappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. The sponge was hard even after soaking before use. Loofah covering was thin and wouldn't absorb soap. Used three times as much! Definitely no bargain. Unfortunately, my contact to the company missed the 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't repurchase
customer_reviews.text: the suction on the holder never stays on the wall so my loofah just falls into the bathtub and I throw it away. The actual exfoliation isn't great- id rather use something else for that and thats the only reason I ordered these. Been using them for a couple months- wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: disgusted
customer_reviews.text: I discovered a dark spot on a new sponge I was using, so decided to cut it open and found mold. I still have four sponges left to use, but I’m almost hesitant on using any more. This is my second time I’ve purchased these and the only time I’ve had an issue like this. I loved these, but I’m not sure if I will purchase anymore from them Note: This was the first time I’ve use that sponge so hasn’t been sitting in the shower wet And I don’t store the new, unused ones in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Although I was a bit worried about this purchase, I was surprised at how well these work! They puff up with water and its a good balance texture. Definitely would buy again! Great price point too.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: There is a strap on the back side for easy holding. Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, the size is bigger than I thought after reading other reviews. There is a strap on the back for you to out your hand through. It comes with two suction cups for the wall which is a nice bonus. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Guetler

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I'd say these are a good value. I think they would be better if they were a bit thinner When they were fully expanded. They puff up alot. I throw mine in the wash machine to make them last a bit longer. I hang dry them outside the shower. that way they dont dry sour.
customer_reviews.author: Agena

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s not too abrasive but it still gets the job done with exfoliation. It’s suction cup hooks work real well too. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Michael Norberg

customer_reviews.title: Tough on dead skin
customer_reviews.text: Decent loofah - I’ve used it many times and don’t feel like it’s softened or loosened at all though. It definitely helps slough off dead skin, and if you don’t mind a sort of rough feel it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it. It doesn't lather it doesn't fill like it's exfoliating. I tried a couple of times and I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Returned to sender
customer_reviews.text: They come compressed. Soaking in water or getting wet seems like it should activate them to expand a bit? I tried one, it curled up and was unusable. I returned
customer_reviews.author: Jen Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something like this for a while now and I'm so happy that I decided to get this one,it works great and my skin feels super clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Gabz

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am used to buying these from a big-box store and the ones they have are significantly larger and fit my hand better. But, these do the job and much less expensive
customer_reviews.author: A. Grice

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: When I removed the first one from the package I thought it was awfully thin and stiff but another reviewer said with use that will improve. I used it for several days and nothing changed. It was like using cardboard on my skin but cardboard would have actually softened with use. I am skeptical that the other reviews are from actual users.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the money . Knowing about the mold that develops on these sponges and having to discard regularly these are a great value .
customer_reviews.author: Shari Green

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was suprised at the quality. The suction works very well and the sponge is absorbent and exfoliating. No weird smell or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Terra220

customer_reviews.title: Eco Friendly Bath Time
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Really enjoy this loofah. They last a long time. I throw mine away after 4 weeks just for cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: Alanda

customer_reviews.title: Harsh
customer_reviews.text: They’re a little too abrasive and uncomfortable. I use them for cleaning and scrubbing tile.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I think they’re great. Smaller than I expected but still good for me. Only reason I gave it 3 stars is because while most of them are soft and bendable there are some I guess “bad ones” that no matter how many times you use them are just super stiff. So that’s the only downside
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin soft!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has an elastic so your hand can go under. You are able to scrub diligently. It’s a pack of 8 so that packet should last for 8-10 months. Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The thing was falling apart in the shower during use...

customer_reviews.text: Personal favorite in the shower and the price is fantastic! Used to find these locally but can't anymore. Would easily pay 3x this amount.

customer_reviews.text: Love using these loofahs in the shower to gently exfoliate my skin.

customer_reviews.text: I like them, but when wet they get too soft sand lose a lot of their scrubbing power. But still worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Grant

customer_reviews.title: Smaller IRL
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a larger version of these loofah pads - closer to 5x7 size - but the local CVS stopped carrying them. Buying this pack of 8 smaller ones saved a lot of money compared to buying one at a time at CVS, but these are just too small for my average adult sized hands. These 4x6 loofah pads are just a bit too small so I'll use them up but doubt I'll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: NigheanRua

customer_reviews.title: Small and don't last.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using these scrubs in lieu of a loofah or other scrubber in the shower, but I was let down. They are super flimsy, thin, and smaller than expected. I went through two of them quickly, and then just bought one of those $3 loofahs from the store and it works great. Sure, this might be good for those rough areas (feet, hands, etc) but nothing else good comes from these.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon and Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great product, very pleased. Thank you for filling order quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rough as a brick, not suited for any type of skin.
customer_reviews.text: This chinese loofah is the harshest I've ever tried, and I've tried many brands. It's either from the worst source or not properly treated... probably both. Be warned that this particular brand can actually hurt your skin, no matter how wet or how long you use it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Resumil

customer_reviews.title: Thin loofah sponge
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are okay. Very thin and flimsy. Not much loofah on sponge, thin layer.

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I used to buy the exact same thing at Target for $5 a piece. They work well but I can only use them for a month or two. Now with this 8 piece package it will last me for a while. And they are the exact same thing I bought from Target. Works great and make my skin smoother than my baby daughter's butt.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you are looking

customer_reviews.text: way too thick not at all what i was looking for I do not recommend these

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with the size but okay product overall.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected so not totally impressed by them.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great sponges! It's work awesome for 10 showers than just replaced it on new one. It's much better than use same sponge for months, and grow bacteria in it! You getting supplies of natural sponges for 80 showers!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Some natural variation but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite loofas since going cruelty free and trying to be more environmentally conscious. I try not to use plastic whenever I have the option so these were a no-brainer. Unfortunately, since they are made from natural plants, there is sone variation in thickness and texture so some are more effective in exfoliation than others. The suction cups don't work at all in a steamy shower, so I just hang them on my shower caddy. Great quantity and quality for the value though!
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Works great, each one only has about 4-6months before degrading
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as they looked similar to loofas I had used while on a business trip in Vietnam. They have a lot of abrasion to them and are amazing for use in the shower. Only drawback is the they seem to only have about a 6 month shelf life and then the bristles start to degrade a bit. But, you get a bunch of them in the pack so it works for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Poofah Loofah
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these loofah sponge pads. When they arrived, they were flat as pancakes, but after getting wet, either the loofah part expanded or the cotton terrycloth underneath shrank (or both), so that, after a couple uses, they assume a convex shape just like using a full loofah -- and there's something to grab onto on the back! Highly recommended, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: imnhvn

customer_reviews.title: Well Made & Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Well Made & Excellent Value. Much preferred over the plastic/nylon shower "poofs" that only last a very short time before coming apart. These loofah sponges are well constructed and provide a great value that lasts much longer than alternative options.
customer_reviews.author: Graystone71

product_meta.title: Exfoliating Loofah Sponge Pads (Pack of 8) - Large 4x6-100% Natural Luffa and Terry Cloth Materials Loofa Sponge Scrubber Body Glove - Men and Women
product_meta.description:
Made from natural grown loofah gourds, our Loofah Sponges provide a gentle daily exfoliating experience. Our economical multi-packs allow you to stock up and replace them when the time comes. Remember to soak your loofah sponge in water before using it for the first time.

Tips for maintaining your Loofah Sponge:

Like any other sponge, loofahs are meant to be used for a limited time before being replaced. However, if you follow these tips on cleaning your loofah, you will be able to a month of use out of a single loofah.

Dry it daily: After using your loofah, remove it from the moist shower environment and leave it somewhere with enough airflow to completely dry it out between uses. If you want to be extra cautious, soap up the loofah and rinse it out on its own after washing yourself and before letting it hang to dry.

Clean it: Your loofah should be cleaned once a week. Every few weeks, soak the loofah in a solution of 5 percent bleach and then rinse thoroughly.

Avoid use after shaving: Bacteria can enter your skin through any sort of nick or cut, so you shouldn't use your loofah on the affected area for a couple of days after shaving.

Replace it regularly: Natural loofahs should be replaced every month. If you notice mold on it or it develops a mildewy or musty odor, replace it immediately.
